translations: v.烧灼，烙（伤口）；（使）麻木（cauterize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The objective was to investigate the effect of cauterizing stapedial artery on rat hearing and inner ear structures.
sentences.translation: 目的是探讨处理镫骨动脉对大鼠内耳解剖结构和功能的影响。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the effect of cauterizing stapedial artery on rat hearing and inner ear structures.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨处理镫骨动脉对大鼠内耳解剖结构和功能的影响。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the efficacy of acute ocular hypertension of rabbits induced by cauterizing vortex veins.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨涡静脉烧灼法诱发兔急性高眼压的效果。
